title: Investigation Initiated
message: Our team has initiated an investigation into the delay in delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience and will provide updates as soon as possible.

title: Delivery Rescheduled
message: We have rescheduled the delivery and it is now expected to arrive within the next 3 business days. Thank you for your patience.

title: Delivery Completed
message: We are pleased to inform you that your order has been successfully delivered. We hope you enjoy your purchase!

title: Escalated to Senior Team
message: Your issue has been escalated to our senior customer service team for urgent attention. We apologize for the delay in response.

title: Resolution in Progress
message: Our team is actively working on resolving your account issue. We appreciate your patience.

title: Replacement Arranged
message: A replacement for the defective product has been arranged and will be shipped to you within the next 2 business days.

title: Product Quality Check
message: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Rest assured, we are conducting a thorough quality check to prevent such issues in the future.

title: Security Audit Initiated
message: Our security team has initiated an audit to investigate the unauthorized charges on your account. We will keep you updated on the progress.

title: Refund Process Started
message: We have initiated the refund process for the unauthorized charges. You should see the amount credited back to your account within 3-5 business days.

title: Bug Fix Deployment
message: We have deployed fixes for the reported website glitches. Please let us know if you encounter any further issues.
